title: SAMSUNG 198 L Direct Cool Single Door 4 Star Refrigerator with Digi Touch Cool  (LUXE BROWN, RR21A2C2XDX/HL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Unit Refrigerator, User Manual with Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Product and 10 Years on Compressor From Samsung
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Digi-Touch Cool: This panel lets you experience intuitive and quick control, and also alerts you of power outages. It also helps restore any loss of temperature. Using this panel, you can save energy by choosing the Eco Mode and a Door Alarm. Also, for quick defrosting, you can activate the e-Defrost feature. You can also select the Power Cool option for fast cooling your food and beverages.
product_description.Digital Inverter Technology: This technology ensures a durable, energy-efficient performance while making low noise. This refrigerator’s Digital Inverter Compressor adjusts its speed automatically as per cooling requirements.

review:
It consumes more power then three star otherwise all features are great and best among all the mid range fridge just go for it and 150rs extra on its electricity consumption..I AM REVIEWING IT AFTER 5 DAYS OF USE..
Design are good and heavy its make ice faster than other fridge a perfect and worth price fridge ..

...... JUST GO FOR IT ON THIS RANGE...

Cute little fridge. Sufficient for a small family. Almost silent in operation. Build quality is good. Comes with a convenient touch pad outside on the refrigerator door to control the temperature settings and defrost the fridge. Sides doesn't get hot in comparison to some other fridges from different brands. Overall value for money. I will definitely suggest this.

Love it. Best at this price range.
Especially love the Build Quality and the myriad controls which can be accessed Without opening the fridge.
Got it for 13K after exchange and Axis bank discount.

1. We have been using it for 6 months, and the performance is good.
2. With the good features at this price.
3. Samsung is at the forefront of giving advance features.
4. It is a suitable choice for middle class and above range people.
5. The color is looking good and impressive

like samsung quality and performance

Writing this Review exactly after 2 months of use. Ideal fridge for a 4-6 member family. Powerful engine. In express mode it makes ice within 30 to 45 min. Performance is really good as per my use, design and looks us also sexy. Don't worry about the side panel getting heat, its Samsung's technology to boost cooling effect in different modes (Also mentioned in samsung user guide). You can buy this fridge for sure. I think price is also fine.
Very good single door refrigerator for a small family. Nice colour. One day delivery by Flipkart. Delivery was very fast. Design is cool and performance is great. Worth buying it...

Good looking. Very nice product. I loved this product.
I recommend to buy this product.

Works prity good . Decent pricing and good quality built . For a family of 5 it's more than enough you get . The front pannel is the only control you get so nothing inside so that's good . Overall we can give a 4.3/5 for this product.

So some people might be looking for some negative side
One is that the wires behind might be a bit scarry because they are simply open so u might first think if they had missed to attach some covering but nothing like that it's by design . So beware of rats

Product is good.but delivery was not good the person who came to deliver the product left the product at the side of the road and I have to carry it to my flat. This behavior is very bad. flipkart should look into it. this is not the way. I need proper explanation for this.

Santosh

I love the design and the color, it looks premium from all angles. Capacity and make is great, very light weight and cools really fast with multiple settings all in front of the door at the top. Shelves are made of glass and decent space alloted for rest of the pantry.
Must say, great deal for small family or family with less use or for people with budget friendly fridge, look no further. This is it.

questions: Q:What is the wattage of this fridge
Q:how to open the door if there is no handle?
Q:Does it require stand or base? Mention size also if require..
Q:Can I keep the Eco Mode turned on forever since I only want to keep vegetables, milk and eggs in the Samsung Digi Touch fridge?
Q:In this product rear panel which materials used
Q:where can i find the key of the refrigerator?
Q:It's any stand need or available external?????
Q:inside controls available..?
Q:Can you suggest any suitable base drawers ?
Q:Defrost makes water spillage on floor?
Q:does it have curd maker>
Q:Does it come with the stand or base drawer?
Q:Is it frost free refrigerator?
Q:How many unit of electricity consumed per year?
Q:Can i use base drawer like in other models....is base drawer available extra
Q:How to set controls that make ice and high cooling only in deep-freezing chamber , but not to whole fridge ? Does it has features for high cooling in deep freezer & low cooling in normal chamber
Q:Where is door handle?
Q:Is this Refrigerator need stabilizer ?
Q:Will it work on inverter?
Q:Body is fiber or metal?
Q:Is it frost free??
answers: A:It is there on the Top. Safe from kids.
A:Yah we can use ECO mode only and it's has enough cooling
A:Metal with Matt finish paint for classy look
A:Inside the pouch containing manual/warranty card.
A:No controls inside.. only on outside with touch display
A:No. It doesn't. Make sure not to keep the refrigerator on top of the thermocol in the base. Will restrict airflow, and thats bad for the unit. Remove the thermocol before switching on the unit.
A:No. But it has an e-defrost button on the panel outside.
A:It has but do not expect great cooling on that option, approx. 25% more cooling than on normal.
A:Door handle is on the top left. Integrated into the door. Smart design.
A:inverter will get spoilt if we use a fridge on it
